mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tblordermain WHERE m_id = #{m_id} Order by om_code desc limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tblordersub (om_code, p_code, os_cnt) VALUES (#{om_code}, #{p_code}, #{os_cnt})
mapper.select: SELECT os.os_code, p.p_code, p.p_name, p.p_price, os.os_cnt, p.p_price*os.os_cnt as os_money FROM tblproduct p, tblordersub os WHERE p.p_code = os.p_code and os.om_code = #{om_code}
SELECT sum(p.p_price * os.os_cnt) as om_total FROM tblproduct as p, tblordersub os WHERE p.p_code = os.p_code and os.om_code = #{om_code}
